metadata.title: CVE-2019-9948 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: urllib in Python 2.x through 2.7.16 supports the local_file: scheme, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypass protection mechanisms that blacklist file: URIs, as demonstrated by triggering a urllib.urlopen('local_file:///etc/passwd') call.

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.16-2').
